column4: ubuntulover_: As far as i know, that is a question for the channel #ubuntu+1 please post it in there

ubuntulover_: Your question is related to the new release of ubuntu, this channel is for 9.04, so you just have to change the channel by using /j <channel_name> in this IRC client. The correct channel for your question is in the channel #ubuntu+1
That seems to work it out too, I just thought that the player would take care of that
